unnormalised: The Delhi Development Authority, or DDA as everyone calls it, is planning some major changes around town. Word on the street is they're revamping the housing schemes.
normalised: The Delhi Development Authority, or D-D-A as everyone calls it, is planning some major changes around town. Word on the street is they are revamping the housing schemes.

unnormalised: Heard from a little birdie (aka my cousin who works there) that the new EWS flats are going to be near Rohini Sector 34, Pincode 110085. Earlier announcements mentioned locations further out, like Narela Sub City.
normalised: Heard from a little birdie (a-k-a my cousin who works there) that the new E-W-S flats are going to be near Rohini Sector thirty four, Pincode one one zero zero eight five. Earlier announcements mentioned locations further out, like Narela Sub City.

unnormalised: Also, keep an eye out for notices from the Municipal Corporation of Delhi (MCD), HQ at Dr. SPM Civic Centre, JLN Marg, Delhi-110002. They're cracking down on illegal constructions, especially in areas like Karol Bagh. They’re sending out notices left, right, and centre.
normalised: Also, keep an eye out for notices from the Municipal Corporation of Delhi (M-C-D), H-Q at Dr. S-P-M Civic Centre, J-L-N Marg, Delhi-one one zero zero zero two. They are cracking down on illegal constructions, especially in areas like Karol Bagh. They are sending out notices left, right, and centre.

unnormalised: And don't forget the big announcement coming from the Ministry of Education, Shastri Bhawan, New Delhi - 110001. Apparently, there’s a change in the school curriculum planned. Keep watching the news!
normalised: And do not forget the big announcement coming from the Ministry of Education, Shastri Bhawan, New Delhi - one one zero zero zero one. Apparently, there is a change in the school curriculum planned. Keep watching the news!
